# Sql Query

## Overview
Execute SQL queries safely

## Protocol
- Type: native
- Source: pattern://chain-patterns/sql_query

## Capabilities
- sql_query

## Usage
```python
from tools.library import sql_query

tool = sql_query.SqlQueryTool()
result = await tool.execute(
    input="your input here"
)
```

- Base: 2 credits
